### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE patients (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  height FLOAT,
  weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  prescription TEXT,
  date_created DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(id)
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  doctor VARCHAR(50),
  reason TEXT,
  outcome TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(id)
);

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM patients WHERE id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender ENUM('Male', 'Female', 'Other'),
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment TEXT,
    date_created TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE clinical_trials (
    trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trial_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE research_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    research_type VARCHAR(255),
    data BLOB,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE PatientVisits (
  visit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  visit_date TIMESTAMP,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  prescription TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalHistory (
  history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  condition TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE LabResults (
  result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  visit_id UUID REFERENCES PatientVisits(visit_id),
  test_name VARCHAR(50),
  result TEXT,
  result_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchData (
  research_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  data_type TEXT,
  data_value JSON,
  record_date TIMESTAMP
);

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
